name: Soul of the Forest (BlayZ_by_FiLL)
description:
You are the Gardener, that trying to save magic forest. The source of forests power -giant tree that calls "Soul of the Forest", lose its magic. Find 3 magic leafs and restore power to Soul of the Forest! 

In game press "Esc" to see controls and game statistics about your progress.

(\/) 0_o (\/)

P.S. This game made as part of "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023". Theme of this Jam - "Growth". Please give my game a try and leave your feedback, i appreciate it.

P.S.S. Special thank to all free assets creators! And especially: Elthen's Pixel Art Shop, Anokolisa, Szadi art., Cainos, aamatniekss.
